name: Lightspeed Hero
description:
Lightspeed Hero

Story:

After a fierce battle on Iridius-12, you take your ship to space so that you can return home. However, an asteroid field is preventing you from reaching lightspeed. Navigate through the rocks, building up your ship's speed as you do so. Reach 100% of ship speed to escape to lightspeed. Hitting asteroids with your craft will slow you down.

Controls:

Directional keys: Move around.

Made using 560 characters with #Pico8 for #TweetTweetJam 7
